intraday.currentCandle: Current candle open = current candle high
intraday.previousCandle: Previous candle open = previous candle high
intraday.previousCandleTwo: 2 previous candle’s open = 2 previous candle’s high

rsiReveral.max: Max of last 5 days close > Max of last 120 days close by (2)%
rsiReveral.volume: Today's Volume > prev (10) Vol SMA by (1.5)
